entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 4:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.7°C

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
